About the designer: David Koma is a Georgian born London based fashion designer who has become synonymous with the body contouring silhouette. After studying fine art in St Petersburg and showing his first collection at age 15, Koma moved to London in 2003 to attend Central St Martins College of Art. Komaâ€™s fascination with the Women form has resulted in a consistent body conscious theme, creating strong architectural shapes.

In 2016, entrepreneurs Emma Grede and Khloe Kardashian launched their now-iconic denim label with the intention of redefining contemporary fashion through innovative and inclusive designs. About the designer: Creative director since 2015, Demna Gvasalia continues Balenciagaâ€™s tradition of extreme experimentation, bringing his uniquely subversive vision to the storied French house. Merging the worlds of streetwear and high fashion, and blatantly disregarding industry conventions, Gvasalia reconfigures the labelâ€™s archival pieces with signature exaggerated silhouettes, asymmetric cuts, and acid colorways. Androgynous blazers, trench coats, and wool overcoats are cut in oversized shapes, while t-shirts, hoodies, and knitwear feature signature logo graphics.

products.name: Crown Vintage Dylann Sandal
products.brandedName: Crown Vintage Dylann Sandal
products.description: The perfect pair to happy hour deals and oversized sunglasses, the Dyalnn sandals from Crown Vintage are a spring and summer staple! The open silhouette and intricate designs make this a fun and flirty add to your closet. What they are: A pair of high-heel sandals. Complete with braided accents, a dainty ankle strap, and trendy square toe. Why youâ€™ll love them: These wedges feature a strong block heel that makes it easy to hop from one patio to the next. How weâ€™d wear them: Fully embrace your feminine era with a short-sleeve lacy mini dress. We're specifically reaching for one with a square neckline and ruffle details.

products.name: Elie Saab - Embellished Tulle Gown - Multi
products.brandedName: Elie Saab Embellished Tulle Gown - Multi
products.description: EXCLUSIVE AT NET-A-PORTER. Elie Saab's exclusive collection is filled with glamorous styles inspired by his Middle Eastern roots. Crafted from tulle, this gown is intricately embroidered with ornate, oversized flowers further emphasized by sparkling sequins. It has lightly padded shoulders, sheer short sleeves and inverted pleats just below the banded waist for subtle shape.

products.name: Peak Lapel Mini Dress in Admiral Crepe
products.brandedName: Theory Peak Lapel Mini Dress in Admiral Crepe
products.unbrandedName: Peak Lapel Mini Dress in Admiral Crepe
products.description: This sleeveless mini dress flares at the skirt to achieve a subtle teacup silhouette.. Zipped along the side, this peak lapeled version is cut from our signature Japanese Admiral Crepe for a smooth and softly draped fit that maintains a polished appearance. We are committed to positively impacting the people who wear our clothes, our industry, and our planet, beginning with our fabrics. Our signature crepe is woven with triacetate, a fabric made from acetic acid and wood pulp sourced from certified responsibly managed forests.
